Title: Silverlight Report Library
Description: Silverlight Report Library makes it easier to print reports using Silverlight 4.0. You no longer have to write your PrintPage eventhandler, just add FrameworkElements to the Report and Print.  It's developed in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Silverlight Report Library makes it easier to print reports using Silverlight 4.0. You no longer have to write your PrintPage eventhandler, just add FrameworkElements to the Report and Print. It's developed in C#.
